!Sentry Roselyn: May the blessing of darkness shelter you. I am Sentry Roselyn, one of the members of the glorious corps of sentries, who protect the Temple of Shilen and guard her people. This path that I am in charge of leads to the surface. Follow the path and go outside to get to the most sacred site for our race, the *Temple of Shilen.* [npc_%objectId%_Chat 1|Ask about the Temple of Shilen] [npc_%objectId%_Quest|Quest]
